hero.title: Find the Perfect Government Schemes for You
hero.subtitle: AI-powered platform to discover and apply for government schemes tailored to your needs
schemes.title: Discover Government Schemes
schemes.subtitle: AI-powered recommendations based on your profile and interests
schemes.alert.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
schemes.alert.description: Our AI recommendation engine analyzes thousands of government schemes and matches them to your specific needs, location, and eligibility criteria. Complete the eligibility test to get highly personalized results with up to 95% accuracy.
features.title: How SchemeSavant Works
features.subtitle: Cutting-edge AI technologies to connect you with the right government schemes
features.1.title: Smart Search
features.1.description: Our AI understands your natural language queries and finds the most relevant schemes for you.
features.2.title: Eligibility Check
features.2.description: Automatically verify your eligibility for various schemes based on your profile information.
features.3.title: Application Assistance
features.3.description: Get step-by-step guidance and document verification for your scheme applications.
cta.title: Start discovering government schemes tailored for you
cta.subtitle: Create your profile and let our AI find the perfect government schemes based on your needs and eligibility.
chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Ask about any government scheme
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant for government schemes. How can I help you today?
chatbot.tts.unsupported: Text-to-speech is not supported in your browser
chatbot.stt.title: Voice input
chatbot.stt.unsupported: Voice recognition is not supported in your browser
chatbot.upload.title: Document upload feature
chatbot.upload.description: This feature will allow document uploading for AI analysis
chatbot.responses.1: Based on your profile, you might be eligible for the PM Kisan Scheme which provides income support to farmers.
chatbot.responses.2: There's a new Digital India Internship scheme that matches your interests. Would you like to know more about the eligibility criteria?
chatbot.responses.3: I found 3 education scholarship programs for which you might qualify. Would you like me to check your eligibility for these?
chatbot.responses.4: The Startup India Seed Fund scheme is currently accepting applications. This might be relevant for your business idea.
